mapper.select: select g.grade_no as "gradeDTO.grade_no", g.grade_name as "gradeDTO.grade_name", u.user_no, u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_email, u.user_year, u.user_month, u.user_day, u.user_photo, u.user_gender, u.user_phone, u.user_address, u.user_joindate from t_grade g inner join t_user u on g.grade_no = u.grade_no where user_no = #{user_no}

select a.map_no, a.map_title, a.map_subtitle, a.map_photo, a.map_content, a.map_country, a.map_state, a.map_city, a.map_like, b.register_regdate, b.user_no, c.user_id, c.user_photo from t_map a left join t_map_register b on a.map_no = b.map_no left join t_user c on b.user_no = c.user_no

select a.map_title, a.map_subtitle, a.map_photo, a.map_content, a.map_country, a.map_state, a.map_city, a.map_like, b.register_regdate, b.user_no, c.user_id, c.user_photo from t_map a left join t_map_register b on a.map_no = b.map_no left join t_user c on b.user_no = c.user_no order by b.register_regdate desc
